mapper.select: SELECT D.SHOP_ID shopId, S.SHOP_NAME shopName, D.ORDER_DATE dayDate, DATE_FORMAT(D.ORDER_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') dayDateStr, COUNT(D.OI_ID) totalOrder, COUNT(IF(D.ORDER_STATE IN ('3','4'), D.OI_ID,NULL)) succeedOrder, SUM(IF(D.ORDER_STATE IN ('3','4'), D.PAYMENT_AMOUNT,0)) saleAmount, SUM(IF(D.ORDER_STATE IN ('3','4','5','6'), D.TOTAL_COST,0)) costAmount, SUM(IF(D.ORDER_STATE = '7', D.TOTAL_COST,0)) virtualAmount FROM( SELECT C.OI_ID, C.ORDER_ID, C.SHOP_ID, C.ORDER_DATE, C.ORDER_STATE, C.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, C.TOTAL_COST FROM ORDER_INFO C WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId}) D,USER_SHOP S WHERE S.SHOP_ID = D.SHOP_ID AND S.SHOP_STATE='1' GROUP BY D.ORDER_DATE,D.SHOP_ID
